headline: PACK EXPO International 2024 Achieves Notable Waste Diversion Through Collaborative Sustainability Efforts
summary: Partnership at the 2024 event between Dow, PMMI, Independent Recycling Services and McCormick Place championed circularity, diverting over 284 tons of waste from landfills Comprehensive sustainability initiatives included integrating renewable energy, ...
